title: The Brain - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/5/21
itunes:title: The Brain - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/5/21
description:
George Noory and author Neil Slade explore his research into the functioning of the brain, how new skills can be developed by stimulating the amygdala, and tips on foods to eat to improve memory and brain function.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
